tasks.label: Build OS (boot + kernel) & Run
args: nasm -f bin "${workspaceFolder}\src\boot\boot.asm" -o "${workspaceFolder}\build\boot.bin" && nasm -f bin "${workspaceFolder}\src\kernel\kernel.asm" -o "${workspaceFolder}\build\kernel.bin" && copy /b "${workspaceFolder}\build\boot.bin"+"${workspaceFolder}\build\kernel.bin" "${workspaceFolder}\build\laos.img" && qemu-system-i386 -drive format=raw,file="${workspaceFolder}\build\laos.img"
